content: {"name": "Montgomery College - Takoma Park Campus Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Each of the three main campuses has a pantry stocked with snacks, food, personal hygiene products, and household items. As an MC student, you are welcome to pick up a snack to carry you through your next class and to take a few items home.\n* Location: Resource Center (Library), RC105", "email": "", "url": "https://www.montgomerycollege.edu/life-at-mc/student-health-and-wellness/fuel-for-success-food-campaign.html?fbclid=IwAR0rUziSyYdjXgOy3zalKydPFZNZSdKqNB1w5RoyqLT7PUvTCqGnMyDpHhw", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "7600 Takoma Ave.", "address_2": null, "city": "Takoma Park", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20912", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.984395, "longitude": -77.021512}, "phones": [{"number": "(251) 744-4411", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Students & staff only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Student ID required"}]}
